License

This is a private project. Therefore you may use this app on your own risk and without any warranty. If you like it or have any comments, please write an email.

This app uses different APIs for translating mobile cell tower information into geographical coordinates: OpenCelliD under the CC BY-SA 4.0 license. Please contribute by the project by uploading cell tower information with your own smartphone. Google Geolocation API under the Google Maps and Cloud platform terms. This app contains mobile ads using the AdMob framework for testing purposes (I guess I won\'t get rich with that)

How does it work?

Install the app on your friends mobile, set a magic word. Whenever you send a text message (SMS) with the magic word to your friends mobile, you will receive a response containing a link with the current location.

Privacy will be maintained, as your friend can decide to switch on or off this app. The accuracy of the location depends on the available information (GPS, network, etc.).
Location services by text message is enabled. Someone else may be able to locate you by sending a special text message.
